title: Original One Women's Noble Tea Party Fascinators Church Hats for Saturday Horse Racing Derby Day
features: 【MATERIAL】 The tea party hat is made of high quality organza (100% Polyester). It is a very light airy fabric. Not easily deformed. Portable and will pack easily.
【SIZE】 The derby hat fit for head circumference 21.5"-22.8". Adjustable string and sweatband inside the hat. The tightness of the hat can be adjusted very well.
【FEATURE】 Classic Cloche hat design. This women dress cloche is a uniquely styled hat. Suitable for every girl and lady.

【OCCASION】 This elegant women hat is very versatile. It usually appears on formal occasions such as Kentucky Derby / Church / Wedding / Tea Party / Cocktail Party / Ascot Race. Easy to carry and foldable.

【CLEANING】 If you make it wrinkle, you can make it look perfect through STEAM IRONING. Or wipe it with a damp cloth first and let your hair dryer heat it up and flatten it with your fingers. Easy to clean and recover.
